docs.text:
Ashe










A library for accessing the riot api based loosely around lol-js


Tests will be written soon


Documentation: 
http://amreuland.github.io/ashe/docs/index.html


Features




All Ashe functions return promises. Isn
t that nice


Limit-By-Region - Riot limits api calls by region, so Ashe does too


Caching - Ashe is ready to cache your data, making multiple calls lightning fast


All calls to the api are separated by region, and each region has its own 
thread


Ashe will retry up to five times if an error occurs




Installation


npm install ashe




Current API Versions




current-game-v1.0


featured-games-v1.0


lol-status-v1.0


league-v2.5


match-v2.2


stats-v1.3


summoner-v1.4


team-v2.4

getLeaguesBySummonerId


getLeaguesBySummonerId(region, summonerIds) ⇒ 
Promise

Returns all leagues for specified summoners and summoners
 teams. Entries for
each requested participant (i.e., each summoner and related teams) will be
included in the returned leagues data, whether or not the participant is
inactive. However, no entries for other inactive summoners or teams in the
leagues will be included.


Kind
: instance method of 
Ashe


Returns
: 
Promise
 - A Promise

Object


Reject
: 
Error


See

https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/985/3351
  








Param


Type


Description










region


string


The region to search in






summonerIds


Array.
String


A list of summoner ids to get data for

getMatchList


getMatchList(region, summonerId, options) ⇒ 
Promise

Gets the list of matches for a summoner in a region


NOT COMPLETE YET


A number of optional parameters are provided for filtering. It is up to
the caller to ensure that the combination of filter parameters provided
is valid for the requested summoner, otherwise, no matches may be
returned. If either of the beginTime or endTime parameters is set, they
must both be set, although there is no maximum limit on their range. If
the beginTime parameter is specified on its own, endTime is assumed to
be the current time. If the endTime parameter is specified on its own,
beginTime is assumed to be the start of the summoner
s match history.


Kind
: instance method of 
Ashe


Returns
: 
Promise
 - A Promise


Fulfil
: 
Object


Reject
: 
Error


See
: Riot API: 
https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1069/3683
  








Param


Type


Description










region


String


the region to search in






summonerId


String


the summoner id to request data for






options


Object


Not yet completed

getSummonersByName


getSummonersByName(region, summonerNames) ⇒ 
Promise

Get summoner objects mapped by standardized summoner name for a given list of summoner names


NOTE
: The function already handles standardizing the names. Returned data
will have the same key as the name provided


The response object contains the summoner objects mapped by the standardized
summoner name, which is the summoner name in all lower case and with spaces
removed. Use this version of the name when checking if the returned object
contains the data for a given summoner. This API will also accept standardized
summoner names as valid parameters, although they are not required.


Kind
: instance method of 
Ashe


Returns
: 
Promise
 - A Promise


Fulfil
: 
Object


Reject
: 
Error

https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1079/3722
  








Param


Type

region


String


The region to search in






summonerNames


Array.
String


A list of summoner names

Retrieve match by ID  Not all matches have timeline data. If timeline data is requested,
but doesn t exist, then the response won t include it.  Kind : instance method of  Ashe  Returns :  Promise  - A Promise  Fulfil :  Object  Reject :  Error  See : Riot API:  https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1064/3671        Param  Type  Description      region  String  region to search in    matchId  String  the match id    options  Object  options (includeTimeline ({boolean}))
docs.title: getMatch

docs.text:
getMatchList(region, summonerId, options) ⇒  Promise 
Gets the list of matches for a summoner in a region  NOT COMPLETE YET  A number of optional parameters are provided for filtering. It is up to
the caller to ensure that the combination of filter parameters provided
is valid for the requested summoner, otherwise, no matches may be
returned. If either of the beginTime or endTime parameters is set, they
must both be set, although there is no maximum limit on their range. If
the beginTime parameter is specified on its own, endTime is assumed to
be the current time. If the endTime parameter is specified on its own,
beginTime is assumed to be the start of the summoner s match history.  Kind : instance method of  Ashe  Returns :  Promise  - A Promise  Fulfil :  Object  Reject :  Error  See : Riot API:  https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1069/3683        Param  Type  Description      region  String  the region to search in    summonerId  String  the summoner id to request data for    options  Object  Not yet completed
docs.title: getMatchList

docs.text:
getSummonersByName(region, summonerNames) ⇒  Promise 
Get summoner objects mapped by standardized summoner name for a given list of summoner names  NOTE : The function already handles standardizing the names. Returned data
will have the same key as the name provided  The response object contains the summoner objects mapped by the standardized
summoner name, which is the summoner name in all lower case and with spaces
removed. Use this version of the name when checking if the returned object
contains the data for a given summoner. This API will also accept standardized
summoner names as valid parameters, although they are not required.  Kind : instance method of  Ashe  Returns :  Promise  - A Promise  Fulfil :  Object  Reject :  Error  See : Riot API:  https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1079/3722        Param  Type  Description      region  String  The region to search in    summonerNames  Array. String  A list of summoner names
docs.title: getSummonersByName
